title: Catho Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Catho.com.br. Provide a search URL or use keyword + location filters.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Catho search URL to scrape. If set, overrides keyword/location.

keyword.title: Search Keywords
keyword.description: Job title or skills to search (e.g., 'desenvolvedor', 'engenheiro').

location.title: City or State
location.description: City or state to search (e.g., 'São Paulo', 'Rio de Janeiro').

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job detail page to extract complete descriptions, benefits, and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs to Extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent requests (tune speed vs blocking risk).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Recommended: Use Apify Proxy (residential or datacenter) to avoid blocking.
